attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Livingstone has does not acknowledge the existence of the country of England outside of the M25. He has proved to be undemocratic and environmentally unfriendly through policies of taxation to pay for the (White Elephant) "Olympic Park", making approximately 250 flights a year and opressed London motorists through congestion charging.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
